name: FOX Agency
tagline: We help business people do business together.
description:
Fox Agency is an integrated marketing agency in the B2B sector, with offices in London and Leeds. Fox combines technology, data, creativity and nous to offer insight and brand strategy, content and search, web and apps, online marketing, integrated campaigns, advertising and activation, experiential, PR, exhibitions and events.
With expertise in the engineering, automotive, electronics and financial services sectors, Fox Agency works with clients including Brother, Speedy Hire PLC, Leica Geosystems, Parker Hannifin, Tesco Bank, B2B International, Fenner Precision, TMD Friction, 2plan Wealth Management, Total Lubricants and more.
